nodes.text: Rin Praji was a male noble of the influential and wealthy House Praji, who won an auction for a Jedi holocron belonging to Cin Drallig. Praji paid several million credits for the holocron, which was sold on the planet Denon. Praji, with a security detail including three armored convoys, took the holocron to a spaceport then a luxury yacht, before departing Denon. Praji took the holocron to his estate on the Core World of Kaikielius for safekeeping.
